named-query.name: taxset.getAll
named-query.query: FROM TextSetEntity t ORDER BY t.priority

named-query.name: taxset.getAllEnabled
named-query.query: FROM TextSetEntity t WHERE t.enabled = TRUE ORDER BY t.priority

named-query.name: taxset.getAllDisabled
named-query.query: FROM TextSetEntity t WHERE (t.enabled = FALSE OR t.enabled IS NULL) ORDER BY t.priority
